Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 7.3°C

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
